entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
